ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm
Class QueueHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.QueueHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBHandler, InputQueueHandler, OutputQueue, OverlayManager, StockSubMsgHandler
public abstract class QueueHandler
extends Thread

QueueHandler is a generic class for a thread which performs blocking reads on a synchronized queue, handling messages from the queue with an abstract processMessage() method. Basically it contains a MessageQueue and a MessageDestination.

Author:
eli

Constructor Detail

QueueHandler

public QueueHandler(String threadName,
                    MessageDestination.DestinationType queueDestinationType)
Constructor. It accepts a name for the thread and destination type, creates a MessageDestination and then build a QueueHandler with QueueHandler(MessageDestination) constructor.

Parameters:
threadName - The name of this Thread.
queueDestinationType - Destination type of the application creating the queue

QueueHandler

public QueueHandler(MessageDestination dest)
Constructor. Build a Thread named dest with "-QueueHandler" suffix to handle queue assigned to MessageDestination dest.

Parameters:
threadName - The name of this Thread.
dest - The destination for this thread to handle.
